titleStmt.title: The pope's bull against the archbishop of Cambray's book, in full length Innocent XII. Pope, ad perpetuam rei memoriam.
Cum alias. English
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Pope (1691-1700 : Innocent XII)

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
English translation from Latin, of the papal brief against Fénelon's book, Explication des maximes des saints sur la vie interieure.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
